channel.title: At java.lang.NumberFormat.Exception.forInputString?
channel.description:
hey i keep getting this message when i run my serv...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1000"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:48 at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:449) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:27)
I dont know how to fix this so can someone explain simple steps to solve this?
Thanks :).

item.title: At java.lang.NumberFormat.Exception.forInputString?
item.dc:creator: @awesomeness1212 awesomeness1212
item.description:
@awesomeness1212 wrote:

ok i fixed it and now i got this:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: server : Unsupported major.minor version 8241.8224…

…Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit.

Between the dots is were the places are but u dont need to know that lol, i just wanna know what this means and what i do to fix this too.

Read full topic

item.title: At java.lang.NumberFormat.Exception.forInputString?
item.dc:creator: @awesomeness1212 awesomeness1212
item.description:
@awesomeness1212 wrote:

so i basically fix the 1000?

item.title: At java.lang.NumberFormat.Exception.forInputString?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s because the string you are trying to parse, isn’t a valid number. I don’t know why “1000” isn’t a valid number though…

Read full topic
